original_text: Paul had decided to leave quickly from there. He did not want to visit Ephesus, because he did not want to remain in Asia for a long time. Instead, he wanted to travel to Jerusalem quickly. He wanted to arrive there before the day of the Pentecost festival.
korean_text: 바울이 아시아에서 지체하지 않기 위하여 에베소를 지나 배 타고 가기로 작정하였으니 이는 될 수 있는 대로 오순절 안에 예루살렘에 이르려고 급히 감이러라

sentences.original_text: Paul had decided to leave quickly from there.
He did not want to visit Ephesus,
because he did not want to remain in Asia for a long time.
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그는 아시아에 오래 머물고 싶지 않았기 때문입니다.

sentences.original_text: Instead, he wanted to travel to Jerusalem quickly.
sentences.korean_translation: 대신에, 그는 빨리 예루살렘으로 여행하고 싶었습니다.

sentences.original_text: He wanted to arrive there before the day of the Pentecost festival.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 오순절 날 전에 그곳에 도착하고 싶었습니다.
